description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Indochina Pioneer is seeking a CUSTOMER SERVICE EXECUTIVE who will take lead in ensuring our famed customer service.
              

              DUTIES:
              
              •	To be a member of the Operations team.
              
              •	To pair with Sales staff to ensure the best quality of service for our guests.
              
              •	To take care of guests before, during and after their Indochina Pioneer trip.
              
              •	To timely report and offer resolutions to any guest issues.
              
              •	To collect and analyze guests feedback for continuous improvements of service.
              
              •	To handle complains and queries from guests.
              
              •	To interact with clients on some online channels.
              
              •	To work closely with other teams in the company to ensure our guests have their best holiday experience.
              
              •	To report to Board of Directors.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS
              
              •	Minimum 02 years working Inbound Tourism/ Hospitality. Experience in Customer Service from international hotels/ tour company is an asset!
              
              •	Excellent English Language skills. (Fluency in other European Languages is an asset)
              
              •	Pro-active, sense of responsibility and can work independently; Positive attitude;
              
              •	Quick and resourceful, flexible, accurate, strong analytical skills
              
              •	Great face-to-face and telephone communication skills;
              
              •	Honest, Open, Co-operative, Teamwork, Motivated and business focused;
              

              QUALIFICATIONS AND KNOWLEDGE
              
              •	This position is for Vietnamese Nationality only.
              
              •	Graduate in Tourism, Hospitality, English Language, Economics or Business preferred
              
              •	Knowledge of tourism, western cultures.
              

              BENEFITS FOR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATES
              
              •	To enjoy the full range of social insurance, health insurance under the provisions of the State.
              
              •	Annual Leave: 12 days /year.
              
              •	Work in a friendly and professional environment.
              
              •	Income: Competitive monthly wage plus exceptional commission policy together with common company benefit. Will be discussed in detail if pass the interview.
              

              CONTACT:
              
              •	Please email CV and cover letter to us via VietnamWorks
              
              •	Email Should be titled: Your Name – Application for Customer Service Executive
              
              •	Attn: Ms. Vy
              
              •	Deadline for closing: Jul 25, 2018
              
              •	Only shortlisted candidates are contacted for the interview.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
